short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of new tabs that are too drab?  Customize your new tab page with HieroGIF! GIF up your tabs without sacrificing style.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HieroGIF brings a fresh new GIF to you every time you open a new tab! 

Designed for those who want to spice up their browsing experience, GIF Tab offers a minimalist new tab page without all the clutter.

You can choose GIFs that fit your style in the options page, and GIF it up!
